properties.Description: Offers 45-minute sessions on successful interviewing techniques. Provides each client with one suit when he has an interview scheduled and a second suit when he gets the job. Clients also receive free tailoring and haircut services when necessary.
properties.Eligibility: A) Adult men age 18 and older, B) Residents of Philadelphia County, C) Low-income and/or from a disadvantaged background

properties.Description: Offers clothing, including jackets and shoes. Personal care items are available Tuesdays and Thursdays during Clothing Closet hours.

properties.site_name: Old First Reformed United Church of Christ
properties.Subheader: Philadelphia - Saturday Morning Breakfast and Clothing Cupboard
properties.Description: Serves a to-go breakfast for up to 50 people. To-go breakfast includes a hot breakfast item, coffee, drink, and various snack items. Also hands out seasonal clothing, and toiletries such as shampoo, lotion, deodorant, and more.
Provide new or secondhand clothing for people who cannot afford to purchase these items at retail prices.
properties.Eligibility: Low income individuals in West Philadelphia

properties.Description: Provides clothing at no cost to those in need.
Distributes food and clothes to those in need.
properties.Eligibility: Individuals experiencing homelessness, Residents of Philadelphia County

properties.Description: Provide new or secondhand clothing for people who cannot afford to purchase these items at retail prices.
properties.Eligibility: Low income individuals in West Philadelphia

properties.Description: Early Intervention program is designed to help children between the ages of 3 and 5 overcome areas of delayed development. The program advocates on behalf of these youngsters, ensuring they receive appropriate special educational services. Children can receive speech therapy, occupational and physical therapy and other special instruction.
properties.Eligibility: Serves residents in the zip codes provided below.

properties.Description: Provides packed lunches and clothing once a month.
Provides clothing and shoes for men, women, and children. Also accepts donations of clean men’s, women’s and children’s clothing and shoes, and linens.

properties.Subheader: Soup Kitchen and Clothing Room - The Clothing Room
properties.Description: Provides clothing to those in need. Offers volunteer opportunities. Accepts monetary donations and donations of toiletries and clothing for men and women.
Provide new or secondhand clothing for people who cannot afford to purchase these items at retail prices.
properties.Eligibility: Low income individuals in West Philadelphia

properties.Description: Provides food baskets and clothing distribution to those in need.

properties.site_name: Center for Leadership, Development and Advocacy (CLDA)
properties.Description: Provides basic needs resources for children, families, and older adults, including clothing, diapers for children and adults, menstruation/period supplies, personal hygiene items, and bookbags and toys for children.
properties.Eligibility: Persons and families in need of basic needs assistance in Philadelphia County

properties.site_name: Whosoever Gospel Mission and Rescue Home Association of Germantown
properties.Description: Offers a variety of clothing, furniture and household items at very reasonable prices to families struggling to make ends meet.

properties.Subheader: Janes Memorial United Methodist Church - Clothing Pantry
properties.Description: Provides clothing to those in need.
